Class main.helper.ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.helper.ScoreBoard

  • public class main.helper.ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the seconds elapsed, and the scores: totalScore,whiteCellsKilled,and redCellsConquered.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean changed
      In order to subtract one point every 30 seconds this variable is used to see if it has been subtracted

      The time the game started

      The total score the game
      private int whiteCellsKilled
      The total white Cells killed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      main.helper.ScoreBoard()
      Uses the calender and SimpleDateFormat and get's the current time mmss in seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • everTurn

        public java.lang.String everTurn()
        Gets the new time mmss in seconds and feeds the change and puts that in seconds. If the seconds is 60 and it is not changed, increase the minutes,then %60 the secondes The call reduces score, and set changed to true If the seconds is 30 and it is not changed call reduces score() and set changed to true if the seconds is 31 or 1 set the changed to false. Then return a string that has minutes:seconds
        Returns:
        a string with minutes:seconds

      • reduceScore

        Reduces totalScore by 1
